entry.title: 考研英语小作文模板
entry.content:
小作文分为两种：

  1. 书信
  2. 通知

书信框架

称呼：        开头段：自我介绍/寒暄+写信目的        中间段：分层描述        结尾段：重申写作目的+期盼回复                                礼貌语，                                署名

称呼

  1. Dear + 人名/昵称,
  2. Dear + Mr./Ms. + 姓氏,
  3. Dear + 头衔/职位 + 姓名,
  4. Dear + 集体身份,
  5. Dear Sir or Madam,

自我介绍

  1. 学生：I am a freshman/sophomore/junior/senior/undergraduate/graduate/postgraduate in the Department of Art in 某大学.
  2. 学生团体：I am the president of the Students’ Union of 某大学.
  3. 公司职员：I am a staff member from your company.
  4. 社会人士：I am sb who + 定从/ As sb who +定从.

寒暄

  1. 好久不见：Long time no see!/ It has been a long time since last time we met.
  2. 最近好吗：How is everything going?/ How have you been?
  3. 收到信后很开心：I am exceedingly delighted to receive your last letter (in which you mentioned that …).

写信目的

必写：I’m writing for the purpose of doing sth …

  1. 求职：apply for the postion of …
  2. 推荐：heartily recommend … as your proper choice
  3. 投诉：complain about …/ makea complaint about …
  4. 邀请：invite you to …
  5. 资讯：request for some detailed information about …
  6. 感谢/道歉：express my heartfelt gratitude/ apology for …
  7. 建议：offer/ give/ propose you some advice/ suggestions on …
  8. 辞职：resign from the current position

分层描述

　(自己写内容，要精彩)
　To begin with,…In addition,…Finally,…

期待回复

　 I would appreciate it if you would send me a reply at your earliest convenience.

通知框架

        Notice                    Dec.18,2021P1：目的+活动介绍+时间P2：具体信息点P3：期待参与+联系方式                    署名

框架例文

Notice
Dec.18,2021
　　Volunteers are needed for an international conference on globalization next month in our school libary.
　　First of all, ... What's more, ... Last but not the least, ...
　　If you are interested in this activity, please contact us by calling 12345 or sending your resume to 12345@qq.com in one week. Welcome to come and expect your excellent performance.
Postgraduate's Association

entry.title: 考研英语大作文模板
entry.content:
大作文的作文层次分为三个部分，根据题意来选择：

  1. 第一段：画图描述
    1.1 单图描述
    1.2 双图描述
  2. 第二段：意义阐述
    2.1 因果论证（现象）
    2.2 正反论证（品质）
  3. 第三段：举例/建议措施
    3.1 举例论证：引出句+例子
    3.2 建议措施：建议+总结

单图描述模板

　　According to the vividly description in the picture, 描述内容（这部分尽量华丽高级一些）. Furthermore, there is a caption under the picture,Which reads, “标题”.

双图描述模板

  1. 引出句：As is vividly shown in the above two pictures, …
  2. 连接词（一正一反）：likewise, on the contrary
  3. 结尾句：Furthermore, there is a caption under the picture,Which reads, “标题”.

因果论证模板

　　Simple as the picture is, the connotation subtly conveyed should be taken into consideration with more insight and penetration. Several factors could account for the negative/positive phenomenon. For one thing, 原因一. For another, 原因二. Undeniably, the phenomenon boasts an irreplaceable value to …/the phenomenon poses an irreplaceable harm to …(总之最后一句总结就行)

正反论证模板

　　Actually, there is a growing awareness of the importance of 某品质. There is no denying the fact that 某品质. can bing our creative power into play, arouse our enthusiasm for work and help us to overcome difficulties. In other words, without 某品质, the goal we set cannot be reached, and the hard nut cannot be cracked. All in all, sth/doing sth is really of utmost significance in this competitive society.

建议措施模板

　　Judging from what has been discussed above, I am convinced that 认为的内容… For one thing, 我们应该… For another, 我们应该… Only in this way can we …
